title: Low priority queue after one game
body:
Second match of my promo, had a problem with the laptop, it overheated and shut down and I couldn't play the game.

Obviously got 9 reports, next time I logged in I got a popup scolding me, now as I type this I'm in the queue 10 minutes waiting for my last promo game.

Never left a game in 3 years before this. Is this expected functionality?

replies.body:
Hello Enhesa, 

I had the same thing happen to me, except I accidentally hit the reset button on my  power station, so yea...awesome. Either way my team wasn't pleased with me and had done the same but also Leaverbuster had got me. First it was five minutes and then if it happens again the wait time stacks up. It last's for five games, you can read more here. 

 Leaverbuster Faq: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q2

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
